title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.2 - Reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.2 - Reports

State Regulations

The superintendent may require any mutual trust investment
company to make such regular and special reports to him at such times as he may
prescribe. The superintendent may prescribe the form and contents of all such
periodical and special reports. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
50.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
